newsitem.title: USA: Shelton group holds 5.4 pct HFNC stake.
newsitem.headline: Shelton group holds 5.4 pct HFNC stake.

text.p: A group led by Shelton Cos, a Charlotte, N.C., private investment firm, said Thursday it has acquired a 5.4 percent stake or 929,583 common shares in HFNC Financial Corp.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its stake includes 96,000 shares it bought between June 29 and August 29 for $1.7 million or $17.647 a share.
The group said it holds the stake for investment purposes.
